author: Vertyco
description: View your Xbox profile, friends, game clips, achievements and more!
end_user_data_statement: This cog Microsofts XSAPI to pull data, it stores your (the bot owner's) client ID and secret for the Azure application for authorization.
install_msg: Thank you for installing! Use `[p]help XTools` for a list of commands you can use. To setup the cog for use, make sure to use `[p]apiset` to set your client ID and secret!
short: Get Xbox Live Info and Player Stats.
